# Trigger Class (Version 1.x.x)

> [!IMPORTANT]
> This documentation is for an older version of this module. Go to the latest documentation [*here*](../../../scriptapi/minecraft/server/Trigger.md).

Represents a trigger for firing an event.

### **eventName**
`eventName: string;`

Event name of the trigger.
